mapper.sql: id, channel_id, channel_type, bank_id, single_limit, single_day_limit, `status`, create_time, update_time
pcb.id, pcb.channel_id, pcb.bank_id, pcb.single_limit, pcb.single_day_limit, pcb.`status`, pcb.create_time, pcb.update_time, pc.code as channel_code, b.name as bank_name
mapper.select:
select
from payment_channel_bank pcb LEFT JOIN payment_channel pc ON pcb.channel_id=pc.id LEFT JOIN bank b ON pcb.bank_id=b.id where pcb.id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert: insert into payment_channel_bank (channel_id, channel_type, bank_id, single_limit, single_day_limit, `status`, create_time, update_time) values (#{channelId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{channelType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{bankId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{singleLimit,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{singleDayLimit,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

channel_id,

bank_id,

mapper.update:
update payment_channel_bank
channel_id = #{channelId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
channel_type = #{channelType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
bank_id = #{bankId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
single_limit = #{singleLimit,jdbcType=INTEGER},
single_day_limit = #{singleDayLimit,jdbcType=INTEGER},
`status` = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update payment_channel_bank set channel_id = #{channelId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, channel_type = #{channelType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, bank_id = #{bankId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, single_limit = #{singleLimit,jdbcType=INTEGER}, single_day_limit = #{singleDayLimit,jdbcType=INTEGER}, `status` = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select
from payment_channel_bank pcb LEFT JOIN payment_channel pc ON pcb.channel_id=pc.id LEFT JOIN bank b ON pcb.bank_id=b.id where pcb.status=0 and pcb.channel_type = #{channelType} and pcb.bank_id=#{bankId}
